entry.title: Valentine's Day Collection Star Studded Heart Pendant
entry.summary:
Vendor: Voylla
Type: Necklace
Price: 2010.00

A charming star studded heart pendant with white rhodium plating and high polish finish for added sheen. Fashioned out of 925 sterling silver, the pendant can be threaded in chains and can also be used as a bracelet charm.
Caring for your fashion jewelry: We, at Voylla, take care of every piece of jewelry so that you don't spend hours caring for them. But do remember, fashion jewelry lasts longer when kept dry and free of chemicals. Follow this simple rule: Your jewelry should be the last thing you put on and the first thing you take off.
